extendedProps.description: Detailed Library Orientation Program for new entrants and senior students interested in learning more about library resources and services.  Covers access to digital resources, research support, and library events.

title: Roshni: Bringing the Light of Rural Artistry

extendedProps.description: An initiative by the Group for Rural Activities (GRA) to connect students with rural Indian artisans.  Features online ordering and an offline exhibition of handcrafted items like Bamboo Rakhis, Key Chains, Notebooks, Side Bags, Jewellery, etc.  Proceeds support rural artisans and promote sustainable crafts.
extendedProps.venue: Hostels 10, 11, and 15 mess areas (7:30 PM to 9:30 PM), Staff Canteen (11:00 AM to 5:00 PM)
extendedProps.organisingBody: Group for Rural Activities (GRA), IIT Bombay

extendedProps.description: Orientation for ShARE IITB, a student-run leadership and consulting organization.  Includes information about their recruitment process, a guest speaker (Jahnvi Nandwani), fun activities, and prizes. Winners of ShARE's Business Challenge will be announced.

Detailed Library Orientation Program for postgraduate students.  Focuses on library resources, services, and guidelines. Includes Research Support Services, access to digital resources and academic databases, and Library Events.

Vaccination drive for students.  MMR, Chicken Pox, Typhoid, and Hepatitis A vaccines are offered. Paid basis (Administration Charges + Vaccine Charges). Online payment only.  Verification of vaccine records for new students.
The largest annual tech showdown among all IITs—featuring mind-bending competitions, cutting-edge innovation, entrepreneurial brilliance, and tech-for-impact challenges.

title: Free Webinar for students looking to pursue higher studies in Germany

extendedProps.description:
Step-by-step admission process through the new Consular Service Portal
Overview of preparatory programs for international students
Information on visa procedures, scholarships, and tuition
Opportunity to ask questions live to our team
extendedProps.organisingBody: German Consulate General, Mumbai & Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay

extendedProps.description: Vaccination and folder making for students.  Vaccines include MMR, Chicken Pox, Typhoid, and Hepatitis A. Paid basis (online payment only).  Students must bring immunization records, student medical form with photo, and have a healthy breakfast/lunch and water.
extendedProps.venue: Hospital new OPD wing, ground floor

title: iGEM IIT Bombay Education Outreach Tech Team Recruitment

extendedProps.description: Recruitment for sophomores (B.Tech, B.Des, and B.S. students) for two key roles within the Education Outreach Subsystem: Visual Communicator and Website UI/UX Designer.  No prior experience needed.

Orientation for ShARE IITB, a student-run leadership and consulting organization.  Includes information about recruitment process, engaging activities, a special speaker (Jahnvi Nandwani), and announcement of Business Challenge winners. Open to 2nd and 3rd year undergraduate and postgraduate students.

title: LRWC Support Courses for Autumn Semester 2025

extendedProps.description: Language support courses offered by the Language Resource and Writing Centre (LRWC) including Academic Speaking for Researchers, Foundations of Academic Speaking, and Essentials for Academic Writing.  Personalized consultations also available.
extendedProps.venue: LRWC Desk (24x7 Reading Hall, Central Library)

extendedProps.description: Vaccination and verification of vaccine records for students.  Paid vaccination (administration and vaccine charges, online payment only).  Folder making is mandatory.  Students must bring immunization/vaccination record, printout of student medical form with photo. Students with cold, cough, fever, or on medication in the past 6 days should not attend.

title: iGEM IIT Bombay Education Outreach Tech Team Recruitment

extendedProps.description: Recruitment for sophomores in Media & Design roles for the iGEM competition. Roles include Visual Communicator and Website UI/UX Designer. No prior experience needed.
extendedProps.organisingBody: iGEM IIT Bombay Education Outreach Subsystem

Open to 2nd and 3rd-year undergraduate and postgraduate students.
